title: V60 "NEXUS DIVINE" full overwrite of AppV1.jsx (Noir Lumière / Haute Couture / Liquid Gold)

requirements.text: Completely delete the current contents of `frontend/src/AppV1.jsx` and replace the entire file with the exact V60 “NEXUS DIVINE” code block provided by the user (verbatim), treating it as the full app UI and local-only logic (Intro → App feed → Salon detail morph modal → Partner/Pro entry), including its imports, hardcoded datasets (`CATEGORIES`, `SALONS`), typography styling (`serifFont`), Framer Motion `layoutId` morphing, “Liquid Gold” service selection effect, and the Champagne Gold final CTA.

acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/AppV1.jsx` is a full-file overwrite containing exactly the user-provided V60 code (no refactors, no feature additions).

requirements.text: Ensure the project compiles and runs after the V60 `AppV1.jsx` overwrite by applying only minimal mechanical fixes required by this repository (e.g., resolving missing/incorrect imports, undefined identifiers, invalid JSX, duplicate default exports) without changing the intended V60 UI layout, styling (Tailwind classes), copy, data, or interaction behavior.

constraints: Frontend immutable entry files must not be modified (per SYSTEM_CONTEXT immutablePaths).
Do not modify `frontend/src/App.tsx`; it must remain the thin wrapper that renders `AppV1`.
Apply only minimal mechanical changes necessary to compile/run; do not change the provided V60 UI, interactions, or in-file data model.
No backend integration work is included; the V60 app remains local-only and uses external image URLs as provided.
nonGoals: Do not implement or restore Internet Identity, role-based routing, React Query data fetching, or any backend-driven salon/booking persistence.
Do not redesign or translate the V60 in-app UI text; preserve the user-provided strings exactly as they appear in the V60 code.
Do not add new features (e.g., additional tabs, real-time updates, payments, or backend APIs).

preferencesToAdd: Use English for any user-facing text in build requests.
